page.title: 14Social Concerns.
page.content: On close inspection of our area it became evident that much facility is made for people with{special needs.} These include a large National Health hospital with excellent casualty coverage, a maternity unit annexe, an ear, eye, nose and throat unit and a centre where cancer cure is researched. Another aspect of caring for people with special needs is the centre for{mentally handicapped}people called Ardwyn House. This is a private organisation for people over 12 years of age. All help is voluntary and its upkeep depends on public support. The youth of this area who demand special attention are catered for in various ways. Children from a broken home may attend Springfield Children's Home. They may stay 5 years.
